definition[0]: to take everything out of a box, bag, suitcase etc

example[1]: She unpacked her suitcase and headed for the beach.

definition[1]: to make an idea or problem easier to understand by considering all the parts of it separately
example[3]: Some of the issues surrounding mental illness have been unpacked in Chapter 3.
